name: CampSites
description: This is a website for the fictional campsites review site NuCamp.

scripts.build: npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin public/contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin public/aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin public/index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin public/search.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/search.html

author: Andrew Weiss
